Description:
Welcome to Hong Kong, the city where the flickering light of neon lights intertwined with everyday life, a city whose exotic locations and seething streets hide one of the most powerful and dangerous criminal organizations in the world - Triad.

In this open-world game you have to try on the role of Wei Shen, undercover cop who is trying to destroy the Triad gangs from the inside.
Prove your value on the way to the tops of the organization, taking part in violent criminal operations, and do not let the criminals to reveal themselves.
Torn between loyalty to a police icon, and gangster code of honor, you have to gamble and not get lost in the blurry boundaries between truth, loyalty and justice.
Features:
"Adult and tough drama about a police undercover, which can open at any time. 
"The explosive action, flavored with a mixture of nuclear lethal martial arts, hot shootings and violent clashes. 
"Mad adrenaline pierce the streets and tear of the sea with a huge fleet of exotic cars, sport bikes and speedboats. 
"Hong Kong - your personal playground: participate in illegal races, bid in cockfights or relax in karaoke. In areas of the city are countless ways to have fun ..

Installation

Typical installation: 
1. Install the game by running Setup.exe 
2. Copy the contents of the folder Crack in a folder with a game 
3. Play 

Installing client Steam (only for holders of a license key) 
Attention! Before installing a client Steam, the game should already be registered to your account, and the client Steam - closed.

Automatic installation: 
1. Run the file SteamInstallHelper.exe and follow the instructions. 
2. Play

Manual setting: 
1. Run Setup.exe 
2. Install the game client Steam (* folder with the client Steam *  steamapps  common  SleepingDogs)
Code:
ie way to install the game should look like this: C:  Program Files  Steam  steamapps  common  SleepingDogs
3. Copy the entire contents of the "Depot" in the root folder of the Steam client 
4. Play.

The game is updated to version 2.0 (2.0.434913)

Added DLC "Zodiac Tournament"
